payload.query: Build comprehensive CI/CD domain capabilities. CI/CD Master responsibilities: pipeline orchestration, build management, deployment automation, quality gates. Deploy specialized CI/CD workers: 1) Pipeline Orchestration Worker (manage pipeline execution, stage coordination, parallel execution), 2) Build Worker (compile code, run builds, artifact generation, caching), 3) Test Automation Worker (run automated tests, collect results, coverage analysis), 4) Deployment Validation Worker (post-deployment testing, health checks, rollback decisions). Integrate with Git, container registries, Kubernetes. Build blue-green deployment capabilities. Implement canary deployments.
payload.title: PHASE 2.9: Develop CI/CD Master and Specialized Workers
